CustomField.formula: IF( ABS((CreatedDate - LastModifiedDate) * 1440) <= 3, IMAGE("/resource/dotBlack", "Black Icon"), /* CreatedDate and LastModifiedDate are within 3 minutes */ CASE( FLOOR(TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)), 0, IMAGE("/resource/dotGreen", "Green Icon"), /* Modified today */ 1, IMAGE("/resource/dotYellow", "Yellow Icon"), /* Modified yesterday */ IMAGE("/resource/dotRed", "Red Icon") /* Modified two or more days ago */ ) )
CustomField.label: Flag
